proposal: Navigating the multichain maze? HerAI simplifies the journey by connecting AMM pools across providers, ensuring seamless swaps between any two tokens. With 83 holders on the ETH network, your project is the compass in a complex DeFi landscape. How about we add some tools to your kit? Our DEX creation and Lottery can offer new revenue streams for your community, not just the team. Let's make DeFi more accessible, together.
